articles.title: 'Bizarre, crazy and beyond belief' - John McEnroe on Covid-19 and his hopes for US Open
articles.description: Tennis legend John McEnroe talks to BBC Sport's Sue Barker about lockdown life and his hopes that a US Open tournament could still happen despite the Coronavirus situation in the United States which he says is "getting worse and bordering on freaking out."
